package.name: com.ekahau.HeatMapper
package.title: Ekahau Heatmapper
package.description: Wi-Fi coverage mapping site survey tool

package.name: org.argolinux.sqlkit.SQLKit
package.title: SqlKit
package.description: application to edit data in a database and python library. Suggestion: install also Postgresql and/or Mysql python driver!

version.file: for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b *.exe') do set setup=%%x "%setup%" /S /D=%CD%
"%ProgramFiles%\Ekahau\Ekahau Heatmapper\uninstall.exe" /S

if "%npackd_cl%" equ "" set npackd_cl=. set onecmd="%npackd_cl%\npackdcl.exe" "path" "--package=com.googlecode.windows-package-manager.CLU" "--versions=[1, 2)" for /f "usebackq delims=" %%x in (`%%onecmd%%`) do set clu=%%x "%clu%\clu" add-path --path "%CD%" verify

if "%npackd_cl%" equ "" set npackd_cl=..\com.googlecode.windows-package-manager.NpackdCL-1 set onecmd="%npackd_cl%\npackdcl.exe" "path" "--package=org.python.Python" "--versions=[2.6.6, 2.6.6]" for /f "usebackq delims=" %%x in (`%%onecmd%%`) do set python=%%x
start "" "%python%\Scripts\sqledit.exe"

for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b sqlkit*') do set name=%%x xcopy "%name%\*" . /E /H rmdir /s /q "%name%"
if "%npackd_cl%" equ "" set npackd_cl=..\com.googlecode.windows-package-manager.NpackdCL-1 set onecmd="%npackd_cl%\npackdcl.exe" "path" "--package=org.python.Python" "--versions=[2.6.6, 2.6.6]" for /f "usebackq delims=" %%x in (`%%onecmd%%`) do set python=%%x
"%python%\python.exe" setup.py install
for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b *.exe') do set setup=%%x "%setup%" /S /D=%CD%
uninstall.exe /S _?=%CD%
